markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“One meditator is skilled in practicing carefully for immersion but not in practicing persistently for it. …”

(These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)

SN.35.1. Ajjhattāniccasutta (“The Interior as Impermanent”)
